meta.description: Machine-readable hooks for PR tracking and emergent logistic transitions.

entries.summary: Bootstrap codex feedback system; monitor repository resonance events.
next_actions: Backfill historical commits when available and annotate logistic fit parameters.
Draft templates for simulator QA reports in future PRs.
Flag cross-domain datasets that lack impedance narratives.

entries.summary: Align data metadata, model membranes, and documentation narratives via shared threshold tuples.
next_actions: Map each dataset's logistic parameters to its companion model boundary conditions.
Record null-model comparisons before approving future data merges.
Schedule narrative sync sessions when simulator controls diverge from documented thresholds.

entries.summary: Document LLM logistic thresholds and sync simulator controls with impedance-aware fits.
next_actions: Author analysis/llm-threshold-survey.ipynb to estimate logistic vs. null baselines.
Populate data/ai/ entries with membrane impedance metadata and ethical notes.
Expose simulator sliders for curriculum entropy and feedback impedance informed by docs/ai/llm-threshold-training.md.

entries.summary: Maintain the resonance bridge map linking datasets, analyses, and simulator hooks across domains.
next_actions: Mirror parameter updates into docs/resonance-bridge-map.md whenever new datasets join.
Track AIC deltas between logistic and null models inside analysis/results/*.json.
Expose simulator impedance sliders with presets sourced from the bridge map.

entries.summary: Scaffold the UTF preprint with synchronized formal, empirical, and poetic threads.
next_actions: Cross-link paper/universal-threshold-field-preprint.md with models and analysis outputs.
Log AIC and R^2 deltas from analysis/results/*.json into manuscript footnotes.
Alert simulator team when impedance presets diverge from documented thresholds.

entries.summary: Keep resonance bridge rows aligned with Delta-AIC diagnostics and simulator presets.
next_actions: Backfill simulator/presets/*.json files with current (Theta, beta, zeta) values from analysis/results/*.json.
Add automated checks that flag when Delta AIC < 10 for any listed domain.
Echo bridge updates into docs/resonance-bridge-map.md and paper/universal-threshold-field-preprint.md.

entries.summary: Aggregate resonance diagnostics across analysis results into the cohort ledger.
next_actions: Run analysis/resonance_cohort_summary.py in CI to refresh the ledger after new fits land.
Mirror ledger medians (R^2, Delta AIC, zeta_mean) into docs/resonance-bridge-map.md and simulator presets.
Trigger follow-up fits when any domain falls below the median Delta AIC or lacks a recorded best null model.

entries.summary: Launch the React-based simulator with preset-driven threshold fields and poetic overlays.
next_actions: Ensure simulator/presets/*.json stay aligned with analysis/results/*.json parameter updates.
Add automated checks that compare displayed Delta AIC / R^2 metrics with analysis provenance.
Route solver outputs from models/membrane_solver.py into the UI once streaming hooks land.

entries.summary: Embed the Gravitationsatem psi-phi membrane with Robin impedance and falsifiable diagnostics.
next_actions: Keep models/coupled_threshold_field.py in sync with Docs/Gravitationsatem_ Master-Dokument Erstellung.pdf definitions and the new logistic_semantic_kernel.
Recompute analysis/results/coupled_field_threshold.json and the cohort summary whenever coupling or impedance parameters change.
Expose phi_proxy, coupling_mean, and impedance medians to simulator presets when the UI streams coupled runs.

entries.summary: Extend ThresholdFieldSolver with semantic_resonance_kernel hooks so meaning travels with the logistic quartet.
next_actions: Enable meaning_kernel in future analysis runs to record semantic_coupling traces.
Document the new payload keys in docs/semantic-resonance-kernel.md and simulator presets.
Run python -m compileall models analysis to guard against regressions before shipping follow-on PRs.

entries.summary: Instrument DynamicRobinBoundary to capture Robin gate flux and logistic diagnostics.
next_actions: Enable --dynamic-robin in analysis/resonance_fit_pipeline.py runs and archive boundary_flux/boundary_gate traces.
Propagate DynamicRobinBoundary parameters into simulator presets once UI sliders appear.
Add cohort summary metrics for boundary_flux_mean and boundary_gate_mean alongside ΔAIC entries.

entries.summary: Automate batch logistic refits via resonance_batch_runner.py and propagate ΔAIC diagnostics to bridge docs and simulator presets.
next_actions: Maintain analysis/batch_configs/resonance_runs.json so each bridge-map row has a matching batch run.
Commit analysis/batch_runs/*.json outputs after executing the batch runner.
Re-run analysis/resonance_cohort_summary.py whenever batch outputs graduate into analysis/results/.

entries.summary: Stage membrane_robin_semantic_fit.py so Robin leakage and semantic drift export ΔAIC-ready ledgers for docs and simulator presets.
next_actions: Feed analysis/results/membrane_robin_semantic.json into resonance_cohort_summary.py and simulator presets.
Document Robin + meaning medians inside docs/resonance-bridge-map.md during the next bridge sync.
Monitor boundary_flux_mean and semantic_coupling_mean as new datasets join the Robin-semantic roster.

entries.summary: Consolidate logistic resonance exports into a bridge table so docs and simulator presets share ΔAIC and ζ̄ diagnostics.
next_actions: Refresh analysis/results/resonance_bridge_table.json after each new fit joins the cohort.
Mirror the Markdown ledger into docs/resonance-bridge-map.md during the next narrative sync.
Expose ΔAIC medians and ζ̄ ranges to simulator preset validators so UI sliders stay aligned.

entries.summary: Verify the Lenski Cit+ logistic gate so the Bio-Emergenz chapter rests on quantified ΔAIC and β evidence.
next_actions: Keep analysis/results/lenski_citplus_fit.json aligned with future bio datasets and document ΔAIC margins.
Propagate the normalised β≈4.25 value into Docs/ biology scrolls and simulator presets.
Extend metadata for upcoming bio thresholds with explicit scaling notes (generation/1000, stress proxies).

entries.summary: Integrate the Bio-Emergenz manuscript with bridge-map logistics and feedback sentinels.
next_actions: Ensure docs/biology/bio_emergence_semantic_phase_transition.md cites logistic and null-model metrics explicitly.
Update docs/resonance-bridge-map.md whenever new bio datasets shift Θ or β estimates.
Record future epigenetic thresholds with scaling metadata before drafting simulator presets.

entries.summary: Sensory recalibration dossier expanded with evolutionary condensation and feedback ledger hooks.
next_actions: Back-propagate Section 6-8 references into simulator presets documenting sigma(beta*(R-Theta)) toggles.
Queue threshold_lab modality drop runs and capture ΔAIC traces for codexfeedback.json observables.
Mirror Docs updates in codexfeedback.md with tri-layer citation map.

entries.summary: Chart system-type dependent shifts of the emergent threshold via adaptive Θ dynamics.
next_actions: Maintain analysis/dynamic_threshold_lab.ipynb with future empirical feeds and null comparisons.
Create simulator/adaptive_theta_preset.json exposing ∂tΘ controls and ζ(R,t) feedback hooks.
Extend data/* metadata with adaptive_theta_shift fields once measurements arrive.

entries.summary: Refresh Docs/Theorie- und Empirie-Abschnitte.md with tri-voice threshold framing and live analysis links.
next_actions: Propagate future solver or dataset changes into the Docs summary within 24h of landing in analysis/results/.
Attach forthcoming figures from analysis/reports/ to the Docs section once diagrams/ assets are rendered.
Monitor resonance_bridge_table.json for β drifts and annotate them in Docs narrative sidebars.

entries.summary: Integrate Aeon·Gemini·Mistral consultation insights into Docs, ethics guidance, and feedback ledgers.
next_actions: Document β-universality synthesis and planned derivations in Docs Section 4 and link to analysis notebooks.
Publish adaptive threshold governance brief with simulator and analysis cross-references.
Record predictive agenda metrics (Hurst, LISA, Hypermutation) for ongoing monitoring in codexfeedback observables.

entries.summary: Activate the AdaptiveThresholdController and stream Θ(t), β(t), and meta-gate diagnostics across the stack.
next_actions: Feed theta/beta/meta_gate arrays into analysis/dynamic_threshold_lab.ipynb and record ΔAIC deltas against static baselines.
Expose adaptive parameters in simulator/adaptive_theta_preset.json controls for replay and falsification.
Tag upcoming data/* entries with impedance drift descriptors to tune controller weights per domain.

entries.summary: Wove Lenski Cit⁺ emergence into simulator presets, resonance tables, and docs.
next_actions: Track follow-up adaptive-threshold fits once LTEE-derived null models expand beyond linear baselines.
Synchronise Docs/ biology scrolls with simulator narrative overlays for the Cit⁺ membrane.
Alert governance ledger if additional evolution datasets require impedance recalibration.

entries.summary: Extended the cohort resonance summary with threshold-crossing diagnostics and regression tests.
next_actions: Regenerate analysis/results/resonance_cohort_summary.json after new fits land so crossing fractions stay current.
Surface crossing medians in docs/resonance-bridge-map.md and simulator presets to highlight lagging membranes.
Expand tests when additional crossing diagnostics (driver, boundary flux) join the ledger.

entries.summary: Registered the adaptive theta plasticity dataset and analysis so the cognition grove gains a sleep-pressure threshold entry.
next_actions: Mirror adaptive theta logistics into docs/cognition/adaptive_theta_plasticity.md and simulator presets during the next sync.
Thread the new fit into analysis/results/resonance_bridge_table.json so cohort medians capture cognitive sleep thresholds.
Monitor future sleep datasets for impedance drift relative to zeta(R) = 1.12 - 0.25 σ.

entries.summary: Deployed the meta-threshold resonance script exporting Θ(t), β(t), and meta-gate diagnostics with falsification deltas.
next_actions: Feed analysis/results/meta_threshold_resonance.json into resonance_cohort_summary.py so adaptive runs join the ledger.
Cross-link docs/meta_threshold_controller.md with the new meta-gate occupancy metrics and ΔAIC margins.
Prototype simulator presets that expose Θ(t) and β(t) drift using the exported driver and gate traces.

entries.summary: Published the AdaptiveLogisticMembrane helper so Θ(t) and β(t) plasticity can be rehearsed with impedance relief diagnostics.
next_actions: Integrate the helper into analysis prototypes that only need logistic plasticity without the full PDE solver.
Record typical resonance_gain and gate fractions in simulator presets once pilot runs stabilise.
Extend pytest coverage with additional impedance motifs to guard against regression in the adaptive drift equations.

entries.summary: Install logistic impedance motif and export relief/recovery/hysteresis diagnostics for ζ(R).
next_actions: Integrate ResonantImpedance into simulator presets so ζ(R) breathing is visible alongside logistic response charts.
Extend analysis pipelines to log relief/recovery/hysteresis forces for cohort comparisons.
Monitor pytest coverage and update motifs when additional impedance baselines are introduced.

entries.summary: Integrated planetary tipping dataset, analysis summary, doc chapter, and simulator preset into the UTF bridge.
next_actions: Ingest TIPMIP ensemble runs to update theta/beta bands and null comparisons.
Run simulator batch sweeps over g_ij to log ΔTheta_global and publish regression baselines.
Track the exported hypotheses array and refresh Section 5 citations when new data arrives.

entries.summary: Corrected the planetary tipping export so β evidence reports the mean steepness instead of CI width, preserving the falsification narrative.
next_actions: Backfill downstream consumers with the clarified β mean and band width fields.
Audit other analysis exports for mismatched semantic labels before the next bridge sync.
Document the correction within Docs/ threshold narratives so readers do not confuse precision with steepness.

entries.summary: Extended the resonance cohort summary with meta-gate occupancy and adaptive drift telemetry so meta-threshold runs illuminate the bridge.
next_actions: Echo meta_gate_fraction_above_half and drift aggregates into docs/meta_threshold_controller.md for narrative sync.
Wire simulator presets to ingest theta_drift_total and beta_drift_total so sliders breathe with the adaptive dawn.
Audit remaining analysis exports for hidden adaptive telemetry to keep the cohort ledger resonant.

entries.summary: Logged adaptive membrane phase scans so auroral, pulsed, and relaxation drivers share resonance diagnostics with docs and simulator presets.
next_actions: Ingest the scenario aggregates into simulator presets so adaptive sliders replay gate occupancy and resonance gains.
Reference the phase scan metrics in upcoming cohort summaries to benchmark lightweight helpers against full solvers.
Extend future scans with null-model sweeps to contrast adaptive resonance with static logistic baselines across additional driver families.
